ComicInfo.Summary:
The Piper
This issue features a special guest appearance by Robyn Hood. Children are disappearing in Manhattan, carried off by some unknown force. Skye's book draws her to the case and she teams up with Robyn Hood to stop one of the Grimm Universes oldest enemies. Don't miss the return of The Piper!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jose Luis & Ulises Grostieta | 1 | B | Cover B | Renato Rei & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | C | Cover C | Meguro | 3 | D | Cover D | Netho Diaz & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | Phoenix Comicon Postcard Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Michael Dooney (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 5 | F | MegaCon Postcard Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | 6 | G | MegaCon Postcard Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | 7 | H | Wizard World Philly Postcard Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 8 | I | Five Points Festival Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 9 | J | Secret Retailer Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
